queries.query: How can I monitor the real-time energy production of solar and wind sources, retrieve emission factors for supported energy sources, perform a discharge operation on a specific energy storage system, update the configuration settings of my energy storage system, and analyze potential emissions for hypothetical scenarios involving different renewable energy sources?

I want to set up a new energy storage system for storing excess renewable energy, retrieve strategies for reducing energy consumption and emissions, download a detailed energy consumption report for analysis, configure the integration of renewable energy into an existing grid, remove an inactive smart device from the monitoring system, analyze the charge-discharge cycles of the storage system for optimization, update the grid distribution configurations accordingly, and delete an old alert for system notifications.

Provide a comprehensive summary of recently detected grid anomalies, including the timeline and severity levels, along with an updated overview of the grid's operational status and health metrics. Additionally, generate a report summarizing system performance and key incidents in the grid infrastructure.

I want to create a new smart device profile with details such as name, energy usage, and attributes, analyze potential carbon emissions for various renewable energy scenarios, retrieve an overview of all linked renewable sources, remove an obsolete device from the system, and view a summarized dashboard for energy usage and savings.

Analyze the historical trends in energy consumption and carbon emissions across different renewable sources, calculate the carbon emissions for a specified energy source and consumption level, configure preferred settings for emission calculations and notifications, compare the emissions generated by multiple energy sources, retrieve a comprehensive list of energy storage systems for potential integration, and fetch the current operational statuses of all monitored transmission lines.

I want to upload external data related to renewable energy production for integration and analysis, set up real-time notifications based on specific criteria such as production drops or capacity limits, and retrieve a list of all renewable energy sources currently linked to storage or production systems for overview and planning.

Retrieve real-time production metrics for renewable energy sources, configure alerts for critical production drops with email notifications, calculate and compare emissions across multiple energy sources based on their consumption data, and generate a downloadable detailed report of energy performance and insights. Additionally, remove obsolete devices from the monitoring system, delete outdated alerts for streamlined notifications, and retrieve a summarized dashboard that highlights energy usage and savings.

Retrieve a detailed report summarizing the key insights and performance metrics of renewable energy systems, analyze historical energy trends to identify patterns and opportunities for optimization, compare the carbon emissions from multiple energy sources based on their consumption, remove outdated renewable energy resources that are no longer active, link a newly identified renewable energy source to an existing storage system to enhance operational efficiency, and initiate the charge operation for a specific energy storage system to store surplus energy effectively.

Identify and report any detected anomalies in the grid infrastructure, visualize the current network topology to understand connectivity, and retrieve charge-discharge cycle data for a specific energy storage system to assess its operational efficiency.

Initiate a charging operation for a specific energy storage system to efficiently store surplus energy, retrieve the current statuses of all monitored transmission lines to ensure grid reliability, and fetch a list of all renewable energy sources linked to the storage systems for operational planning.
